title: "REPTILE YOUTH" Logotype
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anybody help me to find this font ?

Thanks in advance !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/29403_10151203813056624_1348528349_n_5040.png)

comments.content: Looks like [LT Clearface Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132109/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clearface-gothic) Light to me.
